lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 12 (U.P.) -- Newspaper dispatches from Zagreb, in the protectorate of Croatia, said today that five persons, including a German sergeant, were wounded in a gun fight and that in Travnik, Bosnia, thirteen alleged Communists were sentenced to death.
abstract: Alleged Communists continue fighting against Germans and Itals in Croatia

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
